creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text:
The scope of #58130 is only Icon Sets, Data Bars and Color Scales. There's another family of Conditional Formattings added Office 2007+, which is the Conditional Formatting Filters. In Office 2010, these are called "Top/Bottom Rules"

So we don't forget that these CF rules exist too, this issue exists to track that missing functionality
